name: Palette (YanxiWang)
description:
Palette is a 3D exploration narrative puzzle game with horror element, happening in a kindergarten.

You will play as 2 kindergarteners, trapped in a 1-hour time loop by a ghost, helping him to figure out who is the victim of an evil conspiracy, in order to save them before the tragedy happens. 

Talk with NPCs, eavesdrop conversations, observe objects...... Explore the mysterious  kindergarten full of secrets!

It's a game themed children mental health and education.
